alert.note: Alert for Central Washington; Coastal Hancock; Coastal Washington; Interior Hancock; Southern Penobscot (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 07 at 12:17PM EST until January 07 at 11:00PM EST by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 3 and 6 inches. * WHERE...Portions of Coastal DownEast, Interior DownEast, and Penobscot Valley Maine * WHEN...Until 11 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. Patchy blowing and drifting snow expected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Locally higher totals possible around Mount Desert Island and surrounding islands to the south and west.
info.instruction: A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will cause primarily travel difficulties. Expect snow covered roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving. The latest road conditions for Maine can be obtained by going to newengland511.org.

area.areaDesc: Central Washington; Coastal Hancock; Coastal Washington; Interior Hancock; Southern Penobscot
